alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Howard; Lafayette; Little River; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:42AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Little River, Hempstead, Miller, northwestern Lafayette, southeastern Howard, northwestern Nevada, northeastern Cass and southeastern Bowie Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1142 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Halfway to near Blevins to 6 miles southeast of Saratoga to Wake Village to near Maud. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Hope, Wake Village, Nashville, Prescott, Lewisville, Nash, Redwater, Maud, Red Lick, Fouke, Emmet, Blevins, Perrytown, Garland, Tollette, Fulton, Washington, Ogden and Bodcaw. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for southwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Hempstead; Howard; Lafayette; Little River; Nevada
